name: A Little While in a Cafe...
name_original: A Little While in a Cafe...
description:
A Little While in a Cafe... is a short textual diorama. Inhabit a virtual cafe for a short period of time, and experience the little rituals that make cafes so charming. While you're there, why not write a poem or two?

This is first time using Twine as an engine, I also found this jam a little late in the week, so it's not as a finished as I would have liked. That being said, I hope you enjoy spending a little time in this virtual space!

The image used in the cover was from Engin_Akyurt.
